content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":691062,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aaad3e71-fb57-428a-9244-7e7de12bb4bc/Image1 (1).PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aaad3e71-fb57-428a-9244-7e7de12bb4bc/Image1 (1).PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Image1 (1).PNG\",\"name\":\"Image1 (1).PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"aaad3e71-fb57-428a-9244-7e7de12bb4bc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":835,\"height\":449},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DEAR COLLEAGUE,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to the onboarding module for Technology Consultants! This module will give you an overview of EPAM tools and processes, provide you with a list of project infrastructure resources, and let you explore links to EPAM resources that can help you in your daily activities!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The structure of this module is aligned with various aspects of your work. Moreover, there are hints for tools and processes that will support your routine/everyday tasks related to technology consulting, environment, and personal development. Please take time to read thoroughly the content in this module. You can ask additional questions to your manager or mentor. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are very excited that you are now a part of our EPAM TC team and are eager to make the onboarding process as easy as possible for you!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Best regards, \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The EPAM team \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NOTE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": If you are not familiar with an acronym used in this module, you can look it up in the EPAM Acronyms directory \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/acronyms.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://info.epam.com/acronyms.html\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
